data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Jerome Brisard awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Monaco drive upfield and Caio Henrique gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lille defender.
Monaco needs to be cautious. Lille have an attacking throw-in.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick Lille.
Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Lille.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Throw-in Monaco.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Lille.
Sofiane Diop for Monaco drives towards goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jerome Brisard signals a Lille throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco close to the penalty box.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 24, Burak Yilmaz (Lille) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lille are coming forward and Jonathan David gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Goal kick for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Throw-in for Lille in the half of Monaco.
Can Lille capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monaco's half?
In the minute 27, Jerome Brisard signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Monaco's area.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 31, Jerome Brisard signals a Monaco throw-in in Lille's half.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Lille have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 33, Free kick Lille.
Monaco pushes forward through Wissam Ben Yedder, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 37, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Monaco close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Monaco in the half of Lille.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 43, Jonathan Bamba of Lille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Jerome Brisard signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Monaco's area.
Jonathan Bamba for Lille gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 44, Jerome Brisard awards Monaco a goal kick.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Important block from the Lille defence as Kevin Volland fires in a strike for Monaco.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 49, Lille's Burak Yilmaz is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Monaco push forward at Stade Pierre Mauroy and Kevin Volland gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lille defence.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
Jonathan David is on target to give Lille a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 53, Jonathan Ikone with an assist there.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Monaco capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lille's half?
In the minute 57, Jonathan Ikone (Lille) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Monaco.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Monaco.
The away team have replaced Wissam Ben Yedder with Cesc Fabregas. This is the first substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
In the minute 58, Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a second substitution, with Fode Toure replacing Caio Henrique.
Monaco have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 61, Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yusuf Yazici is replacing Jonathan David for the home team.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in Lille.
Jerome Brisard awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 64, Free kick Monaco.
Tiago Djalo for Lille has been booked by Jerome Brisard and receives a first yellow card.
Lille take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Yusuf Yazici.
Great play from Burak Yilmaz to set up the goal.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
Lille make their second substitution with Xeka replacing Benjamin Andre.
In the minute 69, Christophe Galtier is making the team's third substitution at Stade Pierre Mauroy with Tim Weah replacing Jonathan Ikone.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Willem Geubbels is replacing Gelson Martins for Monaco at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Pietro Pellegri is on a sub for Aurelien Tchouameni for Monaco.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Jerome Brisard signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
In the minute 73, In Lille Monaco attack through Pietro Pellegri. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lille.
Throw-in Monaco.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Lille in the half of Monaco.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Lille territory.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In Lille a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jerome Brisard awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Benoit Badiashile with Guillermo Maripan. This is the fifth substitution made today by Niko Kovac.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Lille awarded a free kick in their own half.
Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a fourth substitution, with Isaac Lihadji replacing Jonathan Bamba.
The home team replace Tiago Djalo with Domagoj Bradaric.
In the minute 84, Jerome Brisard signals a Monaco throw-in in Lille's half.
Lille have a goal kick.
Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Lille to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monaco's half?
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jerome Brisard.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Lille goal kick.
Boubakary Soumare gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lille.
Lille's Burak Yilmaz breaks free at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jerome Brisard awards Monaco a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Lille.
Jerome Brisard blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Goal! Pietro Pellegri pulls one back for Monaco to make it 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Cesc Fabregas.
Tim Weah (Lille) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Boubakary Soumare (Lille) gets a yellow card.
